Issue.creator: vladimirwork
Issue.summary: Unable to read from ledger after the upgrade
Issue.description: 1.4.64 rc Steps to Reproduce: 1. Upgrade the whole pool with force=True from 1.3.62 to 1.4.64 simultaneously. 2. Send NYM txn via old or new CLI. 3. Send GET_NYM txns to read NYMs that were added before and after the upgrade. 4. Send SCHEMA txn to the ledger. 5. Send GET_SCHEMA txn to read SCHEMA from Step 4. 6. Send GET_NYM txns to read NYMs that were added before and after the upgrade. Actual Results: GET_NYM txns from Step 3 returns `NYM not found` for existing NYMs but GET_NYM txns from Step 6 returns correct data for the same NYMs. Expected Results: GET_NYM txns should work normally in both cases. >
